name: Turismo Carretera Simulator
description:
The Turismo Carretera Championship in the ultimate racing simulation.

You can drive the best and powerfull racing cars from the most antique racing series of the world. Take you favorite Ford or Chevrolet or Dodge and run against friends online.

Drive more than 400 cars in more than 50 tracks!

Let's drive the most powerfull stock cars from South America...
